algorithm_technique: Sorting the array and pairing smallest with largest elements.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum average formed by pairing the smallest and largest remaining elements repeatedly.
problem_summary_technical: Sort the array and greedily pair the smallest with the largest element, then find the minimum of these averages.
key_insights: Sorting is essential to easily identify the smallest and largest elements.
The greedy strategy of pairing the absolute smallest with the absolute largest at each step guarantees the minimum average.
The problem asks for the minimum of the calculated averages, not the average of all averages.
